programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A condemned killer being transported by train murders a marshal and takes Mark hostage.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark discovers that the new preacher and his wife are impostors planning a robbery.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: Maidie Brant is found by the wagon train. Needing fresh horses after a cougar attack, she is reluctant to say why she would rather pay top dollar for the Major's horses rather than ride back into town.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: While paying a visit to the laundromat before going into work, Malloy encounters a man using the facilities to dry something much different from clothing. On patrol, he and Reed deal with a minister-in-training who uses a very unorthodox method to get his message across, try to reunite a Finnish-speaking child with her family, mediate a strange dispute between feuding neighbors and engage in a high-speed chase with a well known drug dealer.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Malloy and Reed investigate a large car theft operation that targets older cars, then stages them around the city as abandoned vehicles so they can be towed and scrapped. Meanwhile, they try to figure out why the son of Malloy's girlfriend is getting bad grades, search for a suspect who robbed an elderly woman and attempt to rescue two foolish teenagers who enter a house that is being fumigated.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: A lecture on the latest techniques by a young surgeon from Tokyo, and a later demonstration of his surgical skill, turns Winchester into a drunk and Potter into an invalid, whilst bringing home to Hawkeye and B.J. that they are out of touch with new medical practices.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.sub-title: Hot Lips Is Back In Town
programme.desc: Radar, who is smitten with the cute new nurse, Linda Nugent, relies on Hawkeye's expertise on how to cope with the situation. Hot Lips, meanwhile, celebrates her just-granted divorce by taking a step that arouses Colonel Potter's ire.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: The 4077th evacuation to a nearby cave to avoid US artillery fire on a Chinese target poses problems for Hawkeye, who has a claustrophobia problem of which Colonel Potter is not aware.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: The sinister Colonel Flagg pops up at the 4077th again, playing his usual spy games, convinced that Hawkeye is a communist sympathizer after he saves the life of a North Korean soldier. Also, an American soldier is less than impressed.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: When a Hollywood film crew decides to use Mayberry as a backdrop for a movie, everyone in town begins to put on airs, risking the small-town charm that attracted the crew in the first place.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Ignoring his own advice to Opie, Andy plays fast and loose with the facts when trying to sell the old town cannon.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: While the Clampetts are talking about Honest John and why he didn't accept the money, Shifty and his wife are talking about why Shifty gave it back. They decide to work as a team, with Flo posing as John's Spanish mom. Flo is worried that they'll spot her and realize she is not at all Spanish.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Ralph wants Hank to ask her to the Carpenter's Ball, but he comes up with feeble excuses to avoid going. Planning to get the two together at the event, Lisa asks Hank to be her date to the party. In no time, Hooterville is convinced that the Douglases' marriage is on the rocks and that Lisa and Hank are running off to Acapulco.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan plans to kidnap Burkhalter to trade him for an underground agent but ends up with Klink.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.sub-title: Who Stole My Copy Of Mein Kampf?
programme.desc: Hogan plans to eliminate a beautiful allied defector who is giving Klink an award.

programme.title: The Carol Burnett Show
programme.sub-title: Guests Eileen Farrell, Marilyn Horne, And David Frost (part 1)
programme.desc: "Guests Eileen Farrell, Marilyn Horne, and David Frost. Originally aired on 03/22/71."

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Deadly Double
programme.desc: When Robert Crane is charged with the murder of his sister's estranged husband, Mason needs the testimony of sister Helen Reed to clear him of the charge. Unfortunately for all concerned, Helen suffers from multiple personality disorder.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A hypochondriac exchanges his soul for immortality and indestructibility.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A desperate man tries to save his company from bankruptcy.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A young man devotes his entire stay at a summer camp to modeling a one-armed clay knight.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: Mannix wonders why a seemingly open-and-shut case got dropped.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: "A private detective investigates the murder of his ex-girlfriend's husband and gets entangled in small-town corruption."

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: An escaped convict asks Barnaby to help him prove he didn't kill a judge.

programme.title: Highway Patrol
programme.desc: Dan Mathews winds up face-to-face with a homicidal maniac.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Friday and Gannon try to figure out a pattern to a series of candy store hold-ups. The solution comes when they discover that there are two suspects.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: "Gannon goes undercover as a buyer in order to trap fur thieves"

programme.title: My Three Sons
programme.desc: When it becomes clear that Ernie is allergic to Tramp, he feels it's time for him to pack his bags and move out.

programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "Bill and Toony head to the drive-in to catch some toons."

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Beaver makes a new friend in Chuey Varella but the boy only speaks Spanish. So Beaver asks Eddie, who has taken Spanish, for some help but Eddie plays a joke on Beaver by feeding him a sentence in Spanish which ultimately insults Chuey.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: While watching Wally and his friends play baseball, Beaver is put in charge of looking after everyone's coats and watches. However, after the game is over Lumpy comes to claim his watch, but Beaver has no watch to give him.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Torrid Tapestry
programme.desc: Having served a six-year prison sentence for a fire he didn't start, Claude Demay has devised a plan to expose the real criminal, Leonard Voss, who tried to burn down a warehouse containing a valuable art collection.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: Michelle defends college chum Andrea Morrow after she is accused of murdering her abusive lover, Clay Graham. Matlock soon becomes convinced that the murderer was Clay's blind friend, Arthur Hampton, but has a devil of a time proving how a blind man managed to carry off a near-perfect murder.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Attorney Virgil Tibbs returns to Sparta and is soon assigned his first case as a defense attorney.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Members of Flossie Brimmer's family visit the mountain

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A wounded outlaw jeopardizes Cody Durham's courtship with Rose Loring.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Rumors are flying that old prospector Gus Schultz has struck it rich on the Ponderosa. As a result, Ben contends with a veritable battalion of greedy gold hunters.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Marshal Torrance get into trouble with the Army when they try to help a wounded young soldier who deserted.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: After Mark contracts typhoid fever and has a vision of his dead mother, he no longer seems interested in getting well.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: On his deathbed, Joe asks Flint to look after his 17-year-old son, Larry Hanify, and get him to California. The catch is that the boy is in jail, awaiting trial for armed robbery.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Malloy and Reed are left frustrated after investigating the theft of an elderly woman's old television set, but they have hope that a recently passed law may provide her and other victims with compensation. Elsewhere on patrol, they search for an armed robber who shot an over-trusting shopkeeper, and respond to a call of an unusual armed robbery at a drive-in.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Officer Woods' new partner is a nervous and quiet recruit, and the embarrassing secret he's trying to keep from his fellow officers might actually imperil them. On today's patrol, a real estate broker's well meaning but poorly thought out gesture nearly leads to a mob scene, a drug store owner discovers a way to profit from armed robbers and an armed robbery suspect opens fire during his escape attempt.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: On a sub-note, Klinger plays the part of a voodoo practitioner to try and get out of the Army.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: A typical day in the life of Rosie's bar, complete with AWOL problem drinkers, a bound and gagged Winchester and a gambling scheme.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: The impossible happens for the snobbish Charles when he shares an emotional experience with Klinger, who discovers a US nurse, Debbie, finds him and his bizarre attire attractive, while Charles succumbs to the exotic charms of a Korean girl, called Sooni, who he meets at Rosie's Bar.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Talk of a post-war reunion gives B.J. an idea—planning a present-day stateside gathering of 4077th families. He continues to obsess with the idea even under the duress of bug-out instigated by a Chinese breakthrough. Also, Klinger fears that the party will blow his cover, as his mother doesn't know he's stationed in Korea.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: After Andy teases the fairer sex about gossiping, Aunt Bee pulls a prank to prove that men are gossips, too.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy is chosen to be the sole judge of a local beauty pageant. The entrants include Floyd's niece, the mayor's daughter and Ellie Walker.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Drysdale is trying to get his money back, while Jed is trying to prevent him from doing so. And Jethro is trying to come up with a way to beat the smog problem. Drysdale sends Jane over to get the money, posing as a guard. When Jed doesn't give it to him, Drysdale tells him what he's got is a drop in the bucket, and only the President could really do anything. Jed returns the money and says he plans to give all his money to the President.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.sub-title: A Day In The Life Of Oliver Wendell Holmes
programme.desc: The law office of Douglas and Williams is open for business, even though the sign has Oliver Mendell Douglas (later Oliver Wendell Wilkie Holmes) listed as a partner. Unqualified secretary Lisa destroys a office typewriter before having the new phone connected to a fire alarm "clanger". Later, to boost business, she advertises a grand opening special with free prizes and discount law services.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan and the daughter of a German general try to photograph her father's plans designed to prolong the war.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: A baroness is asked by Klink to get secrets out of Hogan, and he complies by giving her a British agent with phony invasion plans.

programme.title: The Carol Burnett Show
programme.sub-title: Guests Eileen Farrell, Marilyn Horne, And David Frost (part 2)
programme.desc: "Guests Eileen Farrell, Marilyn Horne, and David Frost. Originally aired on 03/22/71."

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Empty Tin
programme.desc: Doris Hocksley is shown a personal ad in a Los Angeles newspaper for locating the daughter of Adam Hocksley and providing proof of same. A friend, John Lowell, suggests she pursue the idea to prove she is the rightful heir to the Adam Hocksley estate.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: After a derelict Santa Claus is fired on Christmas Eve, he finds a bottomless sack of gifts. With this bag he sets out to fulfill his one wish—to see the less fortunate inherit the bounties of Christmas.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A man believes that his sister murdered his wife.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A philandering senior manager finds himself being stalked by a previous secretary.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: When a little girl turns up dead and unidentified, Mannix sets out to discover who she was.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: Frank Cannon is called in to investigate a robbery and murder of six people at a rodeo. The police had come up with nothing after six weeks except for the knowledge that there was a film taken of the rodeo at the day of the crime. Cannon believes that there is a possibility that the rodeo clowns may have played a part in the crime and must now learn where the clown suit came from.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: A friend hires Barnaby to find his missing son.

programme.title: Highway Patrol
programme.desc: Dan Mathews races to find a missing armored truck and rescue its endangered guard.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: More than $200,000 worth of imperial jade is reported stolen. Friday and Gannon determine the burglary was an inside job.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: A police officer is shot while making a routine check on a pair of paroled convicts parked near a liquor store.

programme.title: My Three Sons
programme.desc: Chip's romance with a classmate flourishes when he rents a horse and buggy so as to impress the girl's strict, old-fashioned grandmother.

programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "Bill and Toony embark on some wacky winter adventures."

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Beaver becomes good friends with a classmate, Linda Dennison. However, their relationship is blown out of proportion by Beaver's classmates who begin to tease him and goad him into insulting Linda to prove that she isn't his girl.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Being Beaver's godmother, Aunt Martha sends him a gift of a ring that had once belonged to an uncle who was also named Theodore. June cautions Beaver that she doesn't want him taking it to school, but he sneaks off to school with it anyway. This leads to a confrontation between his peers that ends with him getting the ring stuck on his finger.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Violent Vest
programme.desc: Advertising executive Herman Albright is in the wrong place at the wrong time wearing the wrong clothes. These mistakes cost poor Herman his life in a case of mistaken identity.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: At Cassie's request, Matlock reluctantly agrees to represent a famous wrestler accused of killing a long-time rival. The key witness is a young girl whose story might not be completely accurate.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Bubba travels to Atlanta to help his nephew after the boy overdoses on drugs. He soon teams up with a street wise cop to take down the drug ring.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Ben and Jim-Bob get on each other's nerves. They end up dating each other's girlfriends.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Doc tries to keep an alcoholic off the bottle.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: When Joe and Hoss are gone from home trying to warn nearby settlers about renegade indians, Joe is shot with an arrow. Hoss desperately tries to find assistance, finding help in an unlikely group of people.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An old friend of Lucas's returns to town in the company of a shady gambler and is accused of cheating at cards.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Several men are vying for a rancher's daughter's affections. When she is found dead, one of them becomes the prime suspect in her murder.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: Taking a dangerous route through the desert to join up with the wagon train, a small band of settlers takes a turn for the worse when they lose the scout leading them and then can't agree on how to proceed.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: On today's patrol, Malloy and Reed try to corral cattle that are wandering into the downtown area, pull over a speeding bicyclist, chase down a man with a stolen guitar and break up a bar fight. After their shift is over, Reed and his wife witness a gas station holdup on their way to dinner with Malloy and his girlfriend.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Officer Wells appears to have met his match with a new partner who always insists on doing things his own way. Today's shift features a hot-headed husband who's decided he needs a gun to protect his home, and a neglected girl who causes a scare while playing.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: A clumsy foot soldier, "Look Out Below" Conway, finds the quickest way to the crew's heart, boosting morale at the 4077th by cooking gourmet delights. Only Colonel Potter, burdened with a personal crisis, is immune from the high spirits enveloping the hospital.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: A Congressional aide, Williamson, visits the 4077th on a supposedly routine fact-finding tour, but it's discovered that his motives are far deeper—too uncover Margaret as a communist sympathizer. His case is full of innuendo, so the gang set out to help Margaret.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: The arrival of a wounded Korean woman sparks a conflict at the 4077th: Hawkeye wants to heal her, but a steely ROK officer, Lt. Park, is more anxious to "question" her about alleged guerilla activities.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: On leave in Tokyo, Radar is desperately needed back at the crisis-stricken 4077th, but his return is delayed by outside events. While casualties continue to pour in from the front, the 4077th's generator conks out, and the backup has been stolen.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy and Barney, on a spree of destroying illegal stills, are surprised when a trail leads them to two spinster sisters.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy counsels a Mayberry couple who are constantly bickering with each other.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts head to Washington D.C to give their money to the President, and Honest John and Flo follow. Honest John convinces the Clampetts that he knows the President and that they can give him money, which he will give to the President. Flo poses as Sitting Hawk, the last of the District of Colombia Native Americans.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Lisa and Oliver each take a college course in Pixley. Oliver chooses one dealing with farming while Lisa studies psychology. After just a few lessons, everyone in Hooterville is running to "Doctor Lisa", who solves their problems with logical reasoning. An exasperated Oliver's had enough when he has to make an appointment just to see his wife.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan arranges for Burkhalter's sister to keep Klink occupied, so he can leave camp and blow up a train.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan uses the car of an SS man who's just married Klink's old girlfriend and is honeymooning in Paris, where Hogan needs to pass radios to the underground.

programme.title: The Carol Burnett Show
programme.sub-title: Guests Paul Lynde And Nanette Fabray (part 1)
programme.desc: "Guests Paul Lynde and Nanette Fabray. Originally aired on 03/29/71."

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Half-wakened Wife
programme.desc: Frank Lawton goes to visit old friend Scott Shelby and ends up being charged with his muder. Fortunately for Lawton, Mason is another old friend of his.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A convict serving time isolated on an asteroid receives a gift: a robot that looks, sounds and acts like a real woman.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: With the law one step ahead of him, runaway prisoner Rod Collins searches for the pen pal he plans to wed.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: Cash Bentley frantically clings to his youth, even if it means proving he can do exhausting corporal calisthenics.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: Winifred, private secretary and lover of the publisher George Diamond, becomes a runaway witness when a woman falls into the sea and drowns after a quarrel.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: The death of a bank manager's mistress leads Cannon into a case of murder and betrayal.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: A film director arranges for the death of his leading man.

programme.title: Highway Patrol
programme.desc: Dan Mathews hunts a low form of killer who preys on the poor.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Friday and Gannon use newspapers, radio and TV to publicize their clues to the identity of a hit-and-run driver.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Friday goes undercover with the department's chaplain in order to bust a gambling ring.

programme.title: My Three Sons
programme.desc: Ernie's reports of a flying saucer are received with skepticism. But after he snaps photos of the UFO, the Air Force warns him to keep quiet.

programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "Tinsel time! Bill and Toony put up and decorate their retro Christmas tree."

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: When Eddie and some of his other friends brag about shaving, Wally decides it's time he try. After nicking his face, Ward tries to discourage him but this just leads Wally to continue to shave. When Ward catches him again, he scolds him right in front of Eddie which leads to Wally being made fun of.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Ward receives an antique pipe as a gift from Fred Rutherford and a curious Larry and Beaver decide to try it out. First they use coffee but then they try tobacco. When Ward discovers someone has used the pipe, he jumps to the conclusion that Wally is the culprit.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Misguided Missile
programme.desc: Jerry Reynolds, an old war buddy of Mason's, is accused of killing an officer at Vandenburg Air Force Base during the investigation into mysterious missile crashes.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: When Matlock agrees to defend Cassie's friend, Judy, he is shocked to learn that Judy's husband secretly had another wife. As the case continues, Matlock uncovers more shocking facts about Judy's husband.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: A neglected baby stirs maternal feelings in Luann.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: In spring of 1940, Jason practices his music for a town festival

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A woman tries to make her boyfriend jealous when she's had enough of his attitude.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben, Hoss and Joe help the Virginia City militia escort a renegade indian, who believes he is the Almighty, through hostile indian territory and on to prison.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Shotgun man John Beaumont, who Lucas sent to prison, returns with vengeance on his mind.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: After shooting a man in self-defense, Andy Moon turns to Lucas for protection from his vengeful brothers.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: One dry water hole is normal but when the wagon train has two to worry about, Flint and Ben Burns lead a party to find a legend only indians speak of, Shining Water. Troubles await them but the worst may be a too-green city boy.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Reed thinks he's got a great deal lined up on a used boat, but Malloy's convinced there's something fishy going on. While on patrol, they search for a man who sold a stolen horse to a riding academy, use an informant's tip to investigate a suspicious restaurant parking lot attendant and face an accusation of stealing a socialite's diamond ring during a burglary investigation.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Malloy and Reed are on the lookout for a traveling business man driving a green pinto, who called his wife in Nebraska and told her he was going to commit suicide at 2 PM. Meanwhile, they search for a woman who abandoned her newborn baby in a garbage can, and get a tip from an elderly woman about a group of car strippers.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: As company clerk Radar O'Reilly reluctantly prepares to depart the 4077th, the unit is still without electricity due to a broken generator, and the operating room continues to fill up with war wounded as night falls.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Klinger and B.J. both have Radar-related woes, causing them to go on a drinking binge. A drunken B.J. becomes violent with Hawkeye.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: A beautiful and ambitious young nurse, Harris, who plans to become a doctor when she leaves the Army, finds herself in a misunderstanding with Father Mulcahy. Meanwhile, the camp's water supply is depleted, and the rest of the 4077th is more concerned about where their next shower will come from.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: A South Korean woman misinterprets Klinger's motives when he tries to help her daughter financially. Meanwhile, Hawkeye wrestles with his conscience over a promise made to a dying soldier, Eddie Hastings.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy becomes suspicious when a record promoter comes to town to gather material for a folk music album.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney's overzealous policing enrages the people of Mayberry.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts are confused after being taken to a place called a psych ward and being called "paranoiacs and schizophrenics." They ask Honest John what it is about. He tells them it is a mistake and promises they can see the President, just as soon as some trouble is settled. He returns to Flo and tells her he is going to take the Clampetts for another two million. They "sell" Jed the Capitol, and much more of the property.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Lisa cons Oliver into taking a 'fifth' honeymoon together, this time in Hawaii. When they check into the honeymoon suite, they are unaware that the hotel manager's daughter, has given her friends the suite for their honeymoon also. Since the suite has two bedrooms it's just a case of both couples avoiding each other while on their honeymoon(s), for a while anyway.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan gets himself sent to the hospital so he can get information from a wounded agent.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan and crew are ordered to deliver airdropped ammo to the underground.

programme.title: The Carol Burnett Show
programme.sub-title: Guests Paul Lynde And Nanette Fabray (part 2)
programme.desc: "Guests Paul Lynde and Nanette Fabray. Originally aired on 03/29/71."

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Desperate Daughter
programme.desc: Stefan Riker has come from Germany seeking the woman posing as Lisa Bannister. Attempting to help her stepmother, Doris Bannister pretends to be romantically interested in Stefan Riker.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A bank teller pestered by the demands of his job and wife longs for time alone to read books.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: Pushed by his girlfriend, Larry Chetnick plans to rob his company.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A judge tries to prove that his wife’s lover is a coward.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: Mannix searches for Australian sailor Paul Gantry, who is supposedly due to inherit a million dollars.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: Cannon goes undercover as a truck driver to investigate a series of hijackings.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: A series of strange events lead the victim of a nervous-breakdown to the edge of a relapse.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Widow Kate's three daughters organize a lonely hearts club to find eligible bachelors for their mother.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Homer Bedloe has a plan to flood Hooterville Valley to make a recreational lake, threatening both the Shady Rest and the Cannonball.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: There is excitement going on at the hillbilly’s mansion when a package from home arrives. They get everything they can’t get in Beverly Hills, including crawdads. Meanwhile, at the bank, Lucas and Pendleton are trying to find out what crawdad is. They overhear Jane on the phone with Jed saying that he will share his stock of crawdad with Drysdale. The Clampetts are trying to figure out how many crawdads they have and learn of how the government put three men on the task of finding moon(shine).

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale buys the Clampetts a dress store using their money, and the clan decides to check it out. When they arrive at The House of Renee, they are mistaken for poor and Renee tries to help them. She thinks they need jobs. However, the Clampetts think Renee and her models are poor and starving. Renee gives the Clampetts money for food, and they think it is for them to buy food for Renee.

programme.title: Popeye and Pals
programme.sub-title: Little Swee’pea, The Anvil Chorus Girl, Nix On Hypnotricks
programme.desc: "Popeye tackles lions, bears, snakes and countless other animals chasing after Swee'pea at the zoo only to find himself the victim of an assault by Olive for scaring Swee'pea with a toy on their arrival home., Popeye and Bluto pass by Olive's blacksmith shop and are smitten., Popeye's nemesis is a leering hypnotist who attempts to lure Olive Oyl to his home."

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.sub-title: O-solar Meow, One Ham's Family, Baby Puss
programme.desc: "In the future, Tom and Jerry try to one up one another at a cheese mining factory in space., The big bad wolf dresses up as Santa Claus to try to get a ham dinner from a family of pigs but has trouble dealing with the family’s problem child., A little girl makes Tom her baby cat and Jerry with some alley cats taunt the unfortunate feline."

programme.title: The Woody Woodpecker Show
programme.sub-title: Hot Diggity Dog, Airlift A La Carte, Jolly Little Elves, Pecking Holes In Poles, Candyland, The Un-handy Man, Lotsa Luck
programme.desc: "A chef kicks Woody's dog Duffy to keep him away from the food scraps he's throwing away. This leads to a war in which Woody messes with the chef and the chef tries to make Duffy into sausage., Chilly Willy and friends try to get food from the general store before it closes for the winter., A poor shoemaker and his wife invite a hungry elf in to share their donuts. He rewards them by recruiting some elf workers and making their shop a success., A telephone company employee is sent out to capture Woody after he pecks holes in dozens of telephone poles., The Sandman takes a boy and his puppy to Candyland., Charlie tries to build an automatic garage door opener., Woody and Sugarfoot have terrible luck, which doesn't get better when he finds a four-leaf clover."

programme.title: Bugs Bunny and Friends
programme.sub-title: Prince Violent, Sheep Ahoy, Heaven Scent, Box Office Bunny, Porky In The North Woods, Bedtime For Sniffles, Hare-less Wolf
programme.desc: "Bugs tries to protect a castle by kicking Sam the Terrible out and not letting him back in. , Ralph the Wolf waits for the brief interlude between watchdogs before making off with a sheep; however, every attempt by Ralph is thwarted by Sam the Sheepdog. , Pepe chases a cat who painted a white stripe on her back to avoid some dogs. She runs in the park and even out to the mountains but she can't escape Pepe., Bugs takes a peek inside a movie theater that was built directly over his rabbit hole. Elmer and Daffy complicate matters. , When a villainous trapper captures Porky's animal friends in his traps, Porky releases the animals and they vanquish their foe. , Sniffles the mouse tries and tries to stay awake on Christmas Eve, so that he can meet Santa. , The wolf from Riding Hoodwinked gets forced by his wife to hunt down some rabbit. "

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.sub-title: The Night Of The Headless Woman
programme.desc: On a dusty Californian trail, Jim and Artemus intercept a stagecoach whose driver has been hired to smuggle boll weevils. Quickly theorizing that someone is trying to destroy the country's cotton crop, they set out to find the mastermind of the operation and destroy his distribution system before his plan succeeds.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.sub-title: The Ricky And Laura Bell Story
programme.desc: Laurie and Ricky Bell uproot and go west, leaving their comforts in Baltimore. When Laurie announces she is pregnant, Ricky is less than happy as he feels she has just made their lives more complicated, especially where it concerns his needs.

programme.title: The Big Valley
programme.desc: A prominent politician is assassinated and the town drunk is accused. Heath sees a known outlaw in the vicinity riding the drunk’s pinto horse. The problem is, the sheriff swears the outlaw was in jail at that very time.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt is stalked by a hired killer.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A band of Mexicans kidnaps Joe, demanding a $25,000 ransom. And if that's not bad enough, a group of cowboys is planning to rescue Joe, kill him and claim the gold for themselves.

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: Rowdy escorts an injured sheepman and his flock to a nearby town. However, when the town's residents think he is one of the sheepmen, Rowdy finds himself on the receiving end of the same kind of treatment he used to dish out to sheepmen.

programme.title: Have Gun, Will Travel
programme.desc: When a blight kills all the crops except for one farmer's, Paladin must protect him from a greedy storekeeper who wants his farm and his hired gun who has a personal grudge against Paladin.

programme.title: Wanted Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A grieving daughter impatient with the slow-moving wheels of justice vows to bring vengeance upon the man who murdered her father.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: To keep his invalid mother happy, an outlaw forces Lucas and Mark to go along with a masquerade that he is the owner of Lucas' ranch.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A sharecropper enters his colt in a horse race, hoping to win enough money to buy his farm from the owner, who has bet on Mark McCain's entry.

programme.title: The Three Stooges
programme.sub-title: Woman Haters, Ants In The Pantry, Even As I.o.u., Hot Stuff, Gents Without Cents, Dizzy Doctors
programme.desc: "The Stooges join the "Women Haters" club and vow to have nothing to do with the fair sex. Larry marries a girl anyway and attempts to hide the fact from Moe and Curly as they take a train trip. , The Stooges are pest exterminators who drum up business by planting vermin in a ritzy mansion where a party is going on. They are hired, but must pose as guests to work unobserved. , Larry, Curly and Moe make a grand mess of things when they mistake the medicine they're selling for auto polish. , A destitute mother and child move into the stooge's vacant lot home and the boys decide to help them. They steal the kids piggy bank and sneak into the race track. They bet on a long shot that wins and then are gypped out of their winnings by two con men who sell them a washed up race horse. Everything turns out happily when Curly swallows horse vitamins and gives birth to a colt! , The Stooges are government agent entrusted with protecting professor Sneed, who has invented a super rocket fuel. Larry is mistaken for the professor by foreign agents who kidnap the trio and take them to the country of Anemia where they are ordered to produce the rocket fuel or be executed. The boys come up with a concoction they try to pass of as the real stuff, but are exposed when the real professor and his daughter are also kidnapped. The Stooges help them escape, using their secret formula to fuel a jeep. , The Stooges are three small time actors looking for a job. They meet three girl dancers in the situation and get a small part in a big producers show at the shipyard. When the rest of the cast doesn't show up, the Stooges and the girls must put on the whole show themselves. The show is a hit and the Stooges marry the girls and head to Niagara Falls for their honeymoon. "

programme.title: Svengoolie
programme.desc: "A woman is haunted by recurring nightmares, which seem to be instigated by her late husband who supposedly was killed in a fire."

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Joker steals the Jeweled Key Of Kaincardine with the aid of his new invention, a mysterious little spark-spewing box that renders the Dynamic Duo helpless.

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: "Spock's court-martial continues as he attempts to justify his abduction of Pike, the theft of the Enterprise, and his heading for a planet declared forbidden by Starfleet. "

programme.title: Kolchak: The Night Stalker
programme.desc: Defrosted ancient cell samples discovered in the Arctic grow into savage prehistoric primates and go on a rampage.

programme.title: Lost in Space
programme.desc: A visiting family of aliens, called Taurons, have decided to use the Robinson's planet as a new colony. Although the Robinsons cannot understand the language of the visiting family, they welcome them to live in peace and harmony. However, as usual, Dr. Smith causes problems when he panics and draws a gun on the alien family.

programme.title: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea
programme.desc: The Seaview is sent to investigate a mysterious cloud that has caused widespread destruction around the world.

programme.title: Land of the Giants
programme.desc: When the Earthlings help a sympathetic Giant puppeteer as his new puppets, the circus owner becomes suspicious and plans to collect the reward for their capture.

programme.title: The Time Tunnel
programme.desc: In 1519, Tony and Doug vow to slow down Cortez's conquest of Mexico.

programme.title: The Invaders
programme.desc: Vincent's friend stands trial for an invader who vaporized.

programme.title: Thunderbirds
programme.desc: "Brains and Lady Penelope find themselves involved in a rescue mission when the Arlington Bridge collapses, trapping the Mars Probe rocket in the river bed."

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: A favorite graduate dies and leaves $10,000 in his will to Bayside, creating a battle of the sexes at the school as both feel they deserve the endowment.

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: A famous film star comes to Bayside to shoot an anti-drug PSA. The gang is enamored with him but then they discover that he uses drugs himself.

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: If Zack can just get out of detention, he has a chance at winning a trip to Hawaii. Doing their best to get him off the hook, the gang ends up in detention, too.

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: Slater and his father fight over where he should attend college and Zack tries to fix it. Meanwhile, Jessie becomes a cheerleader and worries about college acceptances.

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: After Zack buys class rings for all the seniors at Bayside, he's embarrassed to find out he's been had when the rings turn out to be phonies.

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: It's senior cut day. Zack does his best not to get caught by Belding. Meanwhile, Jessie protests the use of plastic cups.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Fred encounters unforeseen problems when he wins money at the dinosaur racetrack.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: A case of mistaken identity over an engagement ring gets Barney in a fight--literally!

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: The Flintstones and Rubbles travel to Hollyrock and try to become actors.

programme.title: The Jetsons
programme.desc: A PTA meeting conflicts with a football game George wants to go to, and since his boss insists, he pretends to work overtime at the office.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch
programme.desc: Peter is ecstatic when he gets a job at Martinelli's bike shop. However, his wanting to do a thorough job inhibits his speed and work begins piling up and customers begin to get angry. This leads Mr. Martinelli to give Peter the axe. Peter then has a hard time breaking the news to Mike and Carol.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch
programme.desc: Both Robert Reed puts in double duty as Great-Grandpa Brady as does Florence Henderson when she portrays Great-Grandma Hutchins in an episode where the Brady kids play matchmakers and try to get the two together.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: Fonzie tells Al the story of the time an unexpected visitor turned Howard Cunningham's plans for a traditional family Christmas upside down.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: Fonzie receives a Christmas gift from his father but is reluctant to accept and open it. Meanwhile, Richie and Lori Beth argue about what they've spent on each other's gifts, and Joanie is upset at Howard for getting an artificial tree.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: Richie goes to a Leopard Lodge convention with Howard in Chicago despite wanting to go to a Bears game with Potsie and Ralph.

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.sub-title: Murder On The Moosejaw Express: Part 1
programme.desc: While on a train heading to Canada, Laverne and Shirley end up in the middle of espionage—murder!

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.sub-title: Murder On The Moosejaw Express: Part 2
programme.desc: While on a train heading to Canada, Laverne and Shirley end up in the middle of espionage—murder!

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: The gang works to raise money for Frank's annual hobo Christmas dinner.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: Mama fills in for Vint as a mall Santa.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: When Mama's cousin gives the Harpers a live goose for Christmas dinner, Mama relives memories of her childhood while the rest of the family is horrified at the thought of killing their new pet.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A beauty can't choose between Captain Stubing and Doc; a man and his wife return to the ship with an orphaned boy; a hospital executive falls for a seemingly successful businessman.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch
programme.desc: "The entire Brady family manages to overcome personal obstacles to spend a happy holiday together."

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: The Christmas season has everyone in the Christmas spirit. For a joke, Archie purchases some fake nose and mustache glasses that were on sale, but Mike also happened to go to that same store and hit that same sale. Meanwhile, Edith returns from a doctor checkup and confides in Gloria the fact that she has a lump in her breast and she fears it may be breast cancer.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: The clash of two worlds explodes in this episode. Mike's friend is a Draft Dodger and it is Christmas dinner and unbeknownst to Archie this guy is sitting at his Christmas dinner table. The guy is exactly everything Archie hates about Mike's generation. On top of this Archie's friend is also spending Christmas dinner with the Bunkers and he lost his son to the war.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: Edith's religious faith is shaken after her friend, female impersonator Beverly LaSalle, is brutally murdered by street thugs at Christmas.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: Mike is put in the hospital and Beverly LaSalle is murdered by a thug at Chistmas.

programme.title: The Honeymooners
programme.desc: When the Kramdens and Nortons enter a Raccoon costume contest a feud arises between Ralph and Ed.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A man is terrified of falling asleep for fear he might die.

programme.title: The Alfred Hitchcock Hour
programme.desc: When a distressed housekeeper murders her boss, the deceased man's wife is charged with the crime.

programme.desc: While working as a chauffeur in Denver, Colorado, Kimble reluctantly covers for teenager Lauire Ryder after she dents her father's car. But Kimble flees after discovering that Laurie was involved in a hit-and-run. After learning Kimble's identity, Laurie'

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: Willy kidnaps Princess Amara, wife of the king's brother, Fasar, who knows nothing of his brother's slave racket. Jim then sells her to Borca to force his brother, the prince, to accept that slavery is going on.

programme.title: Peter Gunn
programme.desc: The candidate for Governor, Adrian Grimmett, runs on a no-taxes platform. Who could possibly want to assassinate him?

programme.title: Peter Gunn
programme.desc: A judge is shot by the convicted man he's about to sentence.

programme.title: Highway Patrol
programme.desc: Dan Mathews searches for a man to protect him from his brother-in-law's plan to kill him.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Friday learns about a scam artist with a novel twist: he uses an authentic Congressional Medal of Honor to solicit magazine subscriptions.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: A Japanese widow is senselessly murdered, leaving her small daughter an orphan. Friday has a hard time controlling his emotions while seeking the killer.

programme.title: My Three Sons
programme.desc: Robbie is delighted when college classmate Peggy moves in next door, and the pair go to work on a joint assignment for their Shakespeare class. He plays Romeo to her Juliet when a feud between the two families seems imminent.

programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "Bill and Toony get festive with their co-workers at the MeTV Holiday Party."

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Wally needs a new suit for an upcoming dance and he convinces his parents that he's old enough to pick out his own clothes. So he and Beaver go down to the shop and pick out the loudest, cheapest plaid suit in the entire shop.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: A school play has Beaver and his classmates assigned parts and Beaver is assigned the role of a canary. However, he doesn't seem to be graceful enough to fly around like a bird. To make matters worse, on the night of the play, Ward's words of encouragement lead to Beaver coming down with a case of stage fright.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Duplicate Daughter
programme.desc: A mixed-up mess involving blackmail, murder and a boyfriend confounds Mason as he struggles to put all the pieces together.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: Office pranks get out of hand—and may have led to murder. Matlock takes the case of Billy Finley, a recently fired office employee charged in the murder of another pink-slip recipient.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Tragic story of an alcoholic teen who accidentally kills a little girl while she is drinking and driving.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John and Olivia celebrate their 25th wedding anniversary

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt goes after a band of comancheros that raided a camp and kidnapped a girl.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Candy stands accused of murder in the town of Olympus. The victim's father is determined to give Candy a fair trial, but then Joe is locked up on suspicion of murder as well. It's up to Hoss to figure out what's going on in Olympus in enough time to save them both.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Lucas hires an ex-con as a ranch hand, the man is the first one under suspicion when a robbery and murder occur in the area.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas helps his former Army captain, now an undercover federal agent, infiltrate a gang of bank robbers.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: Ever since he was young, Tom Tuckett has been sent to good schools and looked after by an unknown benefactor. When he joins the wagon train, Tuckett sets out to discover who the mysterious benefactor is—and is shocked when the individual's identity is reveal.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: On his way to an auto mechanic, Malloy is ambushed and kidnapped by a group of drug runners who plan to use him to secure the release of one of their associates.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Malloy is asked to fill in for Sgt. MacDonald, leaving Reed to partner with a young probationary officer who lets his judgment be clouded by his constant need to prove himself. On patrol, they search for a purse snatcher inside a church, encounter a burglary in progress at a closed pharmaceutical company and search for an armed robbery suspect in a lumber yard.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Klinger discovers that his duties as company clerk include catering to the eccentric whims of the 4077th officers. Consequently, the unusual demands by Klinger's superiors leave little time to write a letter home to Toledo.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: A brawl at Rosie's Bar puts Rosie in the hospital, and the 4077th doctors are pressed into service as temporary saloon-keepers. Meanwhile, Father Mulcahy is apprehensive that his long-pending promotion to captain will again be denied.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Friction arises between B.J. and Winchester when they are asked to write an article for a prestigious medical journal on how they saved a soldier's life with a daring operation. Meanwhile, Hot Lips receives an eventful visit from Scully.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: A baby born to a Korean woman and an American GI is abandoned at the 4077th. Knowing that Amer-Asian children are often mistreated in Korean society, the troop sets about the frustrating task of finding a new home for the infant.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy tries to help Barney express his lovestruck feelings for Thelma Lou.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy and Opie go to great lengths to show Aunt Bee what a mess they'd be without her.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Elly comes running to Granny with distressing news, sickness! Fairchild, Elly’s bear, is sick. Meanwhile, at the bank, Miss Jane has a visitor, Lieutenant Mark Templeton of the US Navy. He is Matthew Templeton’s brother. Drysdale kicks the two out, and Jane takes Mark to the Clampetts to meet the beautiful Elly. At this time, Granny made medicine for Elly May’s bear, but Jethro ate it. Elly tries to remake it, but fails, and ends up looking a mess.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Oliver contacts Carol, his one-time secretary, to find out where she'd had his watch repaired years earlier. In this pilot for a proposed series, Carol now works for a California realtor. She prevents her current boss from being conned by man that Oliver Douglas had tried to indict back in New York.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan faces a startling development: His captors are sending him to America to demand surrender—with a super weapon supposedly supplied by the Russians.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan must destroy an anti-aircraft defense system designed by a beautiful English woman who may have defected to Germany.

programme.title: The Carol Burnett Show
programme.sub-title: Guests Carol Channing And Steve Lawrence (part 1)
programme.desc: "Guests Carol Channing and Steve Lawrence. Originally aired on 10/06/71."

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Daring Decoy
programme.desc: Daniel Conway is involved in a vicious proxy war with Warner Griffith for control of an oil company. Conway's secretary, Rose Calvert, is spying for Griffith. When Rose is found dead, Conway fears he's being framed for murder and approaches Mason.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: In 1942, a German wonders why he's on the deck of a British steamship, with no memory of how he got there, and an overwhelming sense of impending doom.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A widow sees her son-in-law's photograph among law enforcement mug shots.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: Philip Weaver concocts a scheme to murder his employer.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: A young boy asks Mannix to prove that his hero did not die from a hit-and-run accident but rather was murdered.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: Cannon is hired to investigate when a famous singer is killed in a plane crash. But for some reason, his family is not cooperating and wants the case closed quickly.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: An actor-turned-business frames his double for the murder of his partner.

programme.title: Highway Patrol
programme.desc: Dan Mathews finds an injured woman victim of amnesia on a lonely mountain road.
